title: My League Launcher
body: When i open my League of legends launcher it comes out small. I tried to reinstall and repair. PLZ HELP ME

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean by comes out small.  Can you provide a screenshot and some more details on what you're seeing exactly?  Are you using 4K?  Let me know!
Thank you but my Launcher came back to normal after i restarted my computer.
